/**
 * Standardisierte Log-Formatter
 * Einheitliche Log-Messages f√ºr alle Spieleffekte
 */// AP-System
export const logAP=(player,before,after)=>"\u26A1 AP P".concat(player,": ").concat(before," \u2192 ").concat(after);// Initiative-System
export const logDiscount=(player,before,after)=>"\uD83C\uDFF7\uFE0F Discount P".concat(player,": ").concat(before," \u2192 ").concat(after);export const logRefund=(player,before,after)=>"\u21A9\uFE0F Refund-Pool P".concat(player,": ").concat(before," \u2192 ").concat(after);// Karten-Aktionen
export const logDraw=(player,cardName)=>"\uD83C\uDCCF P".concat(player," zieht: ").concat(cardName);export const logDiscardRandom=(player,cardName)=>"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F P".concat(player," wirft zuf\xE4llig ab: ").concat(cardName);export const logDeactivateRandom=(player,cardName)=>"\u26D4 P".concat(player," Handkarte deaktiviert: ").concat(cardName);// Einfluss-System
export const logBuffStrongest=function(player,cardName){let amount=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:1;return"\uD83D\uDCC8 Einfluss P".concat(player," st\xE4rkste Regierung ").concat(amount>=0?'+':'').concat(amount," (").concat(cardName,")");};// Schutz-System
export const logShield=uid=>"\uD83D\uDEE1\uFE0F Schutz gew\xE4hrt: UID ".concat(uid);// Karten-Status
export const logDeactivateCard=cardName=>"\u26D4 Karte deaktiviert: ".concat(cardName);// Initiative-Aktivierung
export const logInitiativeActivated=player=>"\uD83D\uDD25 Initiative aktiviert von P".concat(player);// Aura-Effekte
export const logInitiativeAura=(player,delta)=>"\uD83D\uDD25 Initiative-Aura: Einfluss \u0394=".concat(delta," auf st\xE4rkste Regierung von P").concat(player);// Spezial-Effekte
export const logAiWeiwei=()=>"\uD83C\uDFA8 Ai Weiwei: +1 Karte & +1 AP bei Sofort-Initiative";export const logPlattformBonus=()=>"\uD83D\uDDA5\uFE0F Plattform-Bonus (Zuckerberg): +1 AP (einmal pro Runde)";export const logOpportunist=(player,amount)=>"\uD83E\uDE9E Opportunist: P".concat(player," spiegelt +").concat(amount);// Symbol-Mapping f√ºr UI-Feed
export const EFFECT_SYMBOLS={AP:'‚ö°',DISCOUNT:'üè∑Ô∏è',REFUND:'‚Ü©Ô∏è',DRAW:'üÉè',SHIELD:'üõ°Ô∏è',BUFF:'üìà',DISCARD:'üóëÔ∏è',DEACTIVATE:'‚õî',INITIATIVE:'üî•',SPECIAL:'üé®',PLATFORM:'üñ•Ô∏è',MIRROR:'ü™û'};
